itunes:title: 301 - Feeling Apathetic? How to Get Super Motivated for 2021 in 3 Steps
itunes:author: Andy J Pizza
itunes:summary:
In 2020 my normal approach to motivation just wasn’t cutting it. When the future is completely unpredictable, working towards some far off achievement just seemed like wishful thinking.

So screw goals. Right?

Wrong - 2020 taught me an invaluable lesson in how to set goals that impact my life right now today.

In this episode I share with you the 3 things that have supercharged me with motivation to crush my creative career goals this year - yes - even in 2021!
